narrative.narrative: Asian Wings Airways is based at Yangon,Myanmar (Burma) and started operations in January 2011. Mandalay is also a hub. It serves about 15 domestic airports besides the two hubs and also Chiang Mai and U-Tapao in Thailand. In June 2014 it had four ATR 72-500's and an A321-100. In 2013 All Nippon Airways of Japan bought 49% of it for 3 billion Japanese Yen. Th other main owner and operator is called Sun Far Travels and Tours Company, Limited.
